website_summaries.verdict: Light and comfortable, especially for those competing in mid-distance races.
pros: We love the fun, energetic color scheme in this pair of shoes, as well as the memories they'll provide for those who like to compete and also photograph their photogenic attire
High marks for quality and ease of fit, even for those competing in his first race
cons: We wish the laces could be a bit stronger

customer_reviews.title: so i wasn't very worried about whether he would like them or not
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my brother who is a size 11 but my mom suggested that I by a size 11.5 just in case and it fit him perfectly. My brother hasn't complained about them once and he complains about everything. I personally am a fan of ASIC's from my wrestling days, so i wasn't very worried about whether he would like them or not, they are pretty trust worthy with their shoes.. Update: they sadly didn't last long. Bummer, I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Ainfires

customer_reviews.title: Not only a good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not only a good looking shoe...it has everything my runner is looking for...Light weight,Fit to size.Cushion,Support ,it even has drainage holes!! Everything about this shoe gives KUDOS to the ASIC brand !! The only drawback I'd mention if you were looking for drawbacks is the laces...whimpy laces.A trip to the store fixed that right up tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puncsak

customer_reviews.title: Just As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Spend the few extra dollars to get these. These things wreak of quality and perfect fit for a medium to slightly narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: This was the shoe that my son wanted. He ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the shoe that my son wanted. He wears a size 11 but these were too small in size 11, we hade to send them back and order a 1/2 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are bright and looks great. The size is as advertised and the quality is beyond my expectations. I am quite pleased and impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Valor

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were great and great price
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great and great price. BUT, they did not come with spikes or wrench as stated. Contacted company and they refused to fix problem
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rodoff

customer_reviews.title: Good track shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter for high jump and hurdles. She loves them. I was afraid when they arrived that they would be too small,because they look small, but the fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Light and perfect for sprinters
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and light, Aasics are always reliable and ideal for runners. As a coach, I definitely recommend all Aasics.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these the entire track season with no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These were a last minute purchase as my son wasn’t planning on running track this year, but the coach talked him into it. He loved the shoes, they fit as expected. They are lightweight and breathable which is important especially in an all day meet.
customer_reviews.author: mysparklinglife

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the shoe daughter wore it for one race and hurt her feet basically the worst shoe I've ever purchased and I've always liked Asics but wouldn't recommend these to anyone unless they just want them to throw away, returned shoe and only got half the refund because they had been wore once, what a joke
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Son used them for track at school. Love them. Fit well. He really liked how he was able to perform in them. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: He's happy so I am happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as he is in track and wanted memorable shoes. He's happy so I am happy. We are ASICS fans.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for our 11 y/o
customer_reviews.text: I bought a men's size 7 for our 11 y/o for middle distances. He LOVES these and swears they make him faster. The laces stay tied too.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Boys

customer_reviews.title: Wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes a little wide but he just ties them tighter. Bright color
customer_reviews.author: Tara T

customer_reviews.title: Really good track shoes in terms of comfort
customer_reviews.text: Really good track shoes in terms of comfort. They seem to run true to size. In this case needed to get a size 11 instead of 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY J LINTON

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my son’s first season running track. Exactly what we needed. The colors matched his uniform and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son for cross country and he absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Boy, not true to size. Couldn’t get my foot into it. Long and narrow is the style. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great hurdling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable with adequate padding in the heels.
customer_reviews.author: Big375

customer_reviews.title: Need to be able to pick out which size spikes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandson for cross country. He absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: sally parker

customer_reviews.title: we didn't use these ones yet... but ...
customer_reviews.text: we didn't use these ones yet ... but have the same kind from 2 years ago and just wanted new ones ..... they are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms to the shoe look great for races and is really light
customer_reviews.text: Bottoms to the shoe look great for races and is really light, however it was a little longer in length than I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Jared Genteman

customer_reviews.title: Got wet and changed to another was slipping and was worst race. Lesson learn even if wet from rain ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these at first track meet and had no problems winning his 100 and 200m race. Got wet and changed to another was slipping and was worst race. Lesson learn even if wet from rain must wear.
customer_reviews.author: SaM man

customer_reviews.title: fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fit well but haven't had a chance to race in them yet but they are very light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gunlap Track and Field Shoe
product_meta.description:
ASICS gears you up for speed with this spiked track shoe.

In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
feature_bullets: ASICS gears you up for speed with this spiked track shoe.
